pylayers.gis.layout.Layout.loadstr2¶

Layout.loadstr2(_filename, _filemat='def.mat', _fileslab='def.slab')[source]¶

load a Graph from a str2 file

Parameters :

_filename : string

str2 filename

_filemat :

mat filename

_fileslab :

slab filename

Notes

Examples

>>> from pylayers.gis.layout import *
>>> L = Layout()
>>> L.loadstr2('Lstruc.str2')
